root.name: James Bond 007: Goldfinger
root.description: Based on the James Bond novel / film of the same name, this text adventure by Angelsoft pits James Bond against the ingenious mad mastermind Auric Goldfinger and his plans to deplete the gold supplies of the USA. At the same time, Bond also has to deal with various other villains such as the foxy Pussy Galore.Â However, the text adventure's plot does deviate significantly from the original story.
